entry.title: Max Shand | CEO & Founder of Serenade | web3 talks | Sep 15th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Max Shand | CEO & Founder of Serenade | web3 talks | Sep 15th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
We're going down under again with Max Shand (https://www.linkedin.com/in/max-shand-700a3ab5/) founder of Serenade.co and Forbes 30 Under 30, the eco-friendly music NFT marketplace made for real fans. Music fans can buy, sell, collect and showcase digital merchandise and collectibles in an eco-friendly format, using just their credit or debit card and deposit account.
Max was employee number one at Afterpay Touch where he helped grow the business to a mega giant of over billion valuation, today's market cap $19,966,186,812.00 - holy cow, yes!!!
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Shiva Rajaraman | VP of Product at OpenSea | web3 talks | April 21st 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Shiva Rajaraman | VP of Product at OpenSea | web3 talks | April 21st 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
Join us for a special fireside chat with Shiva Rajaraman (https://www.linkedin.com/in/shivar/), VP of Product at OpenSea.io - Shiva is a technology veteran and has held senior leadership positions at Spotify, Google, YouTube, and WeWork. His current mission is on ramping the next wave of users into web3 by reducing friction and exploring the intersection of creators and fans in the NFT space at OpenSea.
Thank you Shiva for sharing your incredible experience and vision around developing products from 0-60, walking us through the needs of web3 natives and web3 newbees.
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Daniel Rowland | Head of Strategy and Partnership at LANDR, Oscar-winner | web3 talks | May 5th 2022

media:group.media:title: Daniel Rowland | Head of Strategy and Partnership at LANDR, Oscar-winner | web3 talks | May 5th 2022
media:group.media:description:
Join us for an exciting dive into the music space with Daniel Rowland (https://www.linkedin.com/in/rowlanddaniel/) - oscar winning producer, audio engineer and head of strategy and partnerships at LANDR (https://www.landr.com/). Daniel and I will explore convergence of music, artists, web3 and the future of DeCen. Let's bring our minds and ears to this musical exploration of what's coming next!

entry.title: Dan Elitzer | Co-Founder of Nascent and IDEO CoLab Ventures | web3 talks | May 12th 2022

media:group.media:title: Dan Elitzer | Co-Founder of Nascent and IDEO CoLab Ventures | web3 talks | May 12th 2022
media:group.media:description:
A conversation with Dan Elitzer (https://www.linkedin.com/in/delitzer/) the co-founder of Nascent (https://www.nascent.xyz/) early investors in Etherscan, Messari, Olympus, Optimism, Zapper and much more (portfolio: https://www.nascent.xyz/portfolio). We discussed his experience working with crypto natives, UX friction, low hanging fruit and how companies like Google can support the growing needs of the web3 universe.
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Luke Gniwecki | VP of Product @ LandVault & Founder of Metaverski | web3 talks | May 26th 2022

media:group.media:title: Luke Gniwecki | VP of Product @ LandVault & Founder of Metaverski | web3 talks | May 26th 2022
media:group.media:description:
An in depth perspective with Luke Gniwecki (https://www.linkedin.com/in/lukegniwecki/) on web3 business models, brands entering the metaverse, physical NFTs and how UX is here to save the day!
Luke is the head of product at https://landvault.io/ and a web3 professional with 10+ years of experience including 5+ years of building products in the crypto and blockchain space. His past experience includes launching a token at a crypto startup, working at a blockchain R&D company and later heading the product department at Boson Protocol. Luke is now the founder of Metaverski, a Web3 and Metaverse product consultancy. He is advising the most promising start-ups and scale-ups in Web3 and the Metaverse.
Don't miss his battled tested perspective on building for the metaverse and evolving how companies large and small can leverage their business within the creator economy.
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Geoff Renaud | CMO & Co-founder of Invisible North & Renaud Partners | web3 talks | June 2nd 2022

media:group.media:title: Geoff Renaud | CMO & Co-founder of Invisible North & Renaud Partners | web3 talks | June 2nd 2022
media:group.media:description:
Enjoy this enlightening convo with the mastermind behind web3 biggest marketing projects, such as Coachella's NFT ticketing experience, FTX, coinbase, Moonpay, Algorand, Intuit, Klarna, Ledger, a16z and more. Geoff Renaud CMO and Co-Founder (https://tinyurl.com/438dj9hw) of leading web3 agency https://www.invisiblenorth.com/ shares his web3 story transitioning from web2 enterprises services to web3. Geoff and his business partner guide some of the biggest projects in the world, connect with users, community and technology. Geoff is also the founder of Renaud Partners (https://renaudpartners.com/) a web3 fund and catalyst for early stage web3 projects.
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Chris Nunes, Scott Clark & BC Biermann | IMMUSE Founders | web3 talks | June 9th 2022 | Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Chris Nunes, Scott Clark & BC Biermann | IMMUSE Founders | web3 talks | June 9th 2022 | Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
Don’t miss this mind bending hour with the co-founder of Immuse.xyz (http://IMMUSE.xyz) - CEO Chris Nunes (https://tinyurl.com/4p5w8kc5), head of business development Scott Clark (https://tinyurl.com/yfznp529) & creative director BC Biermann (https://tinyurl.com/3zp2jjke).
Chris, Scott and BC introduce the idea of remixing music in lived spaces. This is a new form of discovery and entertainment that has potential to push the boundaries of spatial music and the relationship between creator and fan. I hope you enjoy these amazing AR demos that have the potential to materialize as NFTs. Will this change how we see live shows, recycle, remix and play with sound and space? Maybe?... get ready to be red pilled!
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Alex Connolly | CTO and Co-founder at Immutable | web3 talks | July 26th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Alex Connolly | CTO and Co-founder at Immutable | web3 talks | July 26th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
It's been too long since we explored the wild world of web3 gaming, so why don't we get the scoop from one of the biggest names in the world, Immutable (https://www.immutable.com/) co-founder and CTO Alex Connolly. (https://www.linkedin.com/in/alex-connolly/)
Immutable was the 1st zk rollup for NFTs and they currently process more NFT trades than any blockchain or rollup globally!!! They attract the biggest creators, partners such as Disney, Guild of Guardians, Gods Unchained, OpeaSea, GameStop and more. Alex has been an OG builder since 2016. They are based in Sydney Australia while their team is global. Let's hear what this brainiac is building to create the best in class web3 gaming primitives and experiences.
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Graham Friedman | Sir Director at Republic Crypto | web3 talks | Aug 4th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Graham Friedman | Sir Director at Republic Crypto | web3 talks | Aug 4th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
Hey web3 Frenz,
Curious where the market is headed or what's driving the bear market?
Sometimes it's hard to see the forest through the trees so that's why we'll be hosting Graham Friedman (https://tinyurl.com/3uxmy5wj) the Director at https://republic.com/crypto who leads investments, crypto and digital assets. We'll be chatting about his incredible career veting deals, web3 projects and markets as a whole. Bring your energy as we make sense of this crazy cycle and how experts like Graham navigate the storm.
Republic.com/crypto is a funding platform that enables anyone to become an investor in private markets and invest directly in vetted startups, real estate, video games, local businesses, growth-stage companies, crypto, music, litigation finance and more. The Republic ecosystem has deployed over $800 million in investments, has supported over 600 companies, and boasts a community of over 1.5M users across 100 countries.
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Chris Tramount | CEO and Co-Founder of Scare.City | web3 talks | Aug 25th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Chris Tramount | CEO and Co-Founder of Scare.City | web3 talks | Aug 25th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
Hey web3 Frenz,
Join us for a chat with Chris Tramount (https://twitter.com/ctramount) the co-founder of Scarce City (https://scarce.city/) one of the leading Bitcoin marketplaces.
Scarce City is a Bitcoin auction house and marketplace for art, Bitcoin NFTs, collectibles, apparel, and mining equipment. Since debuting our first auction in December 2020, we've facilitated over 200 BTC in sales. Our current focus is building out our fixed price marketplace for physical items for which we welcome creators and sellers to sell their goods for bitcoin.
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Daniel Johnsen | Chief Creative Officer at Playchain | web3 talks | Sep 1st 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Daniel Johnsen | Chief Creative Officer at Playchain | web3 talks | Sep 1st 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
Hey web3 Frenz,
We're back with more gaming excitement!
Check out this exciting conversation with Daniel Johnsen (https://tinyurl.com/3ea7t54h) the Chief Creative Officer at Playchain (https://playchain.com/). Daniel is a Denmark based veteran in the space having worked on large titles such as Kiloo (https://www.kiloogames.com/) with 3 Billion downloads! His background includes 3D art, design, creative leadership and more. Playchain is bringing gamers and developers into web3 through better toolkits and support for their transition to blockchain.
We'll be discussing: How to build web3 games What support is needed and where you find it Trends and pitfalls What's coming next! Don't miss the chance to hear and chat with a passionate creative leader in the space!
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Brandon Tory | CEO & Co-Founder of Formless | web3 talks | Sep 8th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Brandon Tory | CEO & Co-Founder of Formless | web3 talks | Sep 8th 2022 | MC: Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
Hey web3 Frenz,
We're back at it again with an incredible story from the great and powerful Brandon Tory (https://www.brandontory.com/). Web3 founder, music artist, engineer and much more Brandon is reshaping what's possible for creatives in the web3 space. CNN commented "This engineer was a homeless teen — now he’s a rapper who also works at Google" (the article). Brandon, a former Apple ENG, Google staff ENG and Co-signed Artist with Timbaland (https://tinyurl.com/yc2bbbt9) is now the founder of Formless (https://www.formless.xyz/), a web3 project building products like Share that is empowering new and existing artists to take ownership of their work and enabling true ownership and monetization of their work.
Don't miss his incredible story and future vision around the shared economy, reinventing the creative industry and much more!
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Raullen Chai | CEO & Co-founder of IoTex | web3 talks | Oct 6th 2022 | Hosted by Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Raullen Chai | CEO & Co-founder of IoTex | web3 talks | Oct 6th 2022 | Hosted by Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
Join us for our 1st web3 ioT founder Raullen Chai (https://www.linkedin.com/in/raullenchai/ ), Founder and CEO of IoTeX (https://iotex.io/) . Raullen is working to power billions of devices and decentralized applications across the physical and digital world. 15,000 devices connected, 49,185,679 transactions and counting!
IoTeX is on a mission to build a connected world where everyday people will own their data, devices, and identity. Harnessing the power of blockchain, IoTeX will unlock the potential of smart devices/data and empower a new generation of real world Dapps and digital assets.
Let's jump into the wild world of connected devices, data markets and empowering the users through a global network of devices.
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Peter Schiff | CEO & Chief global strategist of Euro Pacific Cap Inc | web3 talks | Sep 29th 2022

media:group.media:title: Peter Schiff | CEO & Chief global strategist of Euro Pacific Cap Inc | web3 talks | Sep 29th 2022
media:group.media:description:
Hey frenz,
Hope you enjoyed our session with Raoul Pal, drum roll please...our next guest will be the king of econ Peter Schiff (http://goog_751751745/), CEO and chief global strategist of Euro Pacific Capital Inc. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Schiff)
We'll be diving deep into capital markets, gold, BTC, macros and how crypto might have a long term play in society or not? Peter has been a global economics icon for his bold market predictions in 2008 and firm stance on asset markets, crypto and capitalism. You've seen him on CNN, Yahoo Finance, NYTimes, Bloomberg, Fox, MSNBC, Schiff Radio (https://schiffradio.com/) and many more.
Linkedin: https://tinyurl.com/392nupyj Twitter: https://tinyurl.com/3dpyh46x
Career snapshot Peter Schiff began his investment career as a financial consultant with Shearson Lehman Brothers, after having earned a degree in finance and accounting from U.C. Berkeley in 1987. A financial professional for over twenty years, he is the owner of Euro Pacific Asset Management, Chief Economist and Global Strategist for Euro Pacific Capital (a division of Alliance Global Partners), and Chairman of SchiffGold (a precious metals dealer based out of Manhattan). He is also the host of The Peter Schiff Show Podcast. An expert on money, economic theory, and international investing, Peter is a highly recommended broker by many leading financial newsletters and investment advisory services. He holds FINRA Series 4, 7, 24, 27, 53, 55, 63 & 65 licenses.
Notable achievements Peter achieved national notoriety in 2008 as being one of the few economists to have accurately forecast the financial crisis well in advance. Between 2004 and 2006 he had made numerous high-profile statements predicting the bursting of the real estate bubble, significant declines in national real estate prices, the collapse of the mortgage market and the banking sector, the bankruptcy and bailout of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac. Peter has authored several best-selling books including Crash Proof, Crash Proof 2.0, How and Economy Grows and Why it Crashes, The Little Book of Bull Moves in Bear Markets, and The Real Crash. He also served as an economic advisor to the 2008 Ron Paul presidential campaign.
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc

entry.title: Raoul Pal | CEO of RealVision, GMI, etc. | web3 talks | Sep 29th 2022 | Hosted by Raphael Hyde

media:group.media:title: Raoul Pal | CEO of RealVision, GMI, etc. | web3 talks | Sep 29th 2022 | Hosted by Raphael Hyde
media:group.media:description:
Hey web3 frenz!
I'm beyond excited for this week's special guest! We have the great and powerful Raoul Pal (@RaoulGMI), founder & CEO of Real Vision (http://realvision.com), Global Macro Investor (www.globalmacroinvestor.com/), Exponential AgeTM Asset Management and ScienceMagic.Studios (www.sciencemagicstudios.xyz/) joining us for an hour of all things macro, finance and web3! With all the craziness in the world, why not bring in the master chief to tell us what's going on :)
Raoul has held several senior roles in the financial markets over the last 32 years; from running equity/equity derivative sales to hedge funds at Goldman Sachs to founding and managing a Global Macro hedge fund for GLG Partners (one of the largest hedge fund firms in the world).
Raoul's Career
In 2005 he began publishing the Global Macro Investor (GMI), a world-renowned institutional investment strategy publication read by the world’s biggest hedge funds, asset managers and family offices, which he still publishes to this day. In 2014 he also co-Founded Real Vision, the preeminent financial media platform and community, which extensively covers both traditional asset markets and digital asset markets. He is working on turning Real Vision into a Web 3 community and FinTech platform.
Raoul has been investing in crypto and digital assets since 2013, when he wrote the first ever macroeconomic analysis of bitcoin in GMI. In 2021 he co-founded two new businesses to capture opportunities in the rise of Web 3; Exponential Age Asset Management, an asset management firm that invests in Digital Asset hedge funds and Science.Magic Studios, a token venture studio that creates token economies and participates in the worlds large cultural communities; music, sports, entertainment and fashion.
He lives in the Cayman Islands.
Hosted by, Raphael Hyde https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphael-hyde-4416494/ Google web3 community lead | Google UX | web3 Angel
Music by Sunset Music Inc
